rules_text: Choose target player. Until end of turn, if a spell or ability that player controls would cause them to draw a card, each of their opponents draws a card instead.
notes:
i know we have a weirdly high amount of these effects but this has been planned for AGES and will be important for me next set

fluffy: him or her—>them, outside—>except during (draw outside isn’t in magicese but except during is, Defence Grid), that player’s—>theirs since there’s already a that player in there, draw—>draws
